verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Give thanks unto the Lord, call on His name
Give thanks unto the Lord, call on His name
And sing to Him, sing praise to Him
Glory in His holy name

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And rejoice in the Lord, rejoice in the Lord
Let the hearts of those who seek the Lord rejoice
And rejoice in the Lord, rejoice in the Lord
Let the hearts of those who seek the Lord rejoice

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Give thanks unto the Lord for He is good
Give thanks unto the Lord for He is good
And His love endures forever
Call upon His holy name

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And rejoice in the Lord, rejoice in the Lord
Let the hearts of those who seek the Lord rejoice
And rejoice in the Lord, rejoice in the Lord
Let the hearts of those who seek the Lord rejoice

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Tell all the nations what He has done
Tell all the nations what He has done
Tell of His mighty deeds, all His mighty deeds
Glory in His holy name

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
And rejoice in the Lord, rejoice in the Lord
Let the hearts of those who seek the Lord rejoice
And rejoice in the Lord, rejoice in the Lord
Let the hearts of those who seek the Lord rejoice
